content: {"name": "Blue Water Community Food Depot", "alternate_name": "", "description": "A completed voucher available from Blue Water Community Action, Department of Human Services, and most area churches is required along with a photo ID with a current address. For more information call 810-987-7886.", "email": "", "url": "https://svdpdetroit.org/How-We-Help/Matchan-Nutrition-Center--Food-Depots", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2408 10th Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Port Huron", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48060", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.9581796, "longitude": -82.43181349999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(810) 987-7886", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:45"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:45"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
